subsection.name: What is the IFrame Perspective Plugin?
subsection.p: The IFrame Perspective Plugin privides an IFrame based CMS Perspective Plugin, with keeping the navigation states of the IFrame element.

subsection.name: Project status
subsection.p: The latest version is 1.02.00 and 1.01.00. v1.02.00 is compatible with Hippo CMS 2.21.06 or later, while v1.01.00 is compatible with Hippo CMS 2.19.xx or [2.21.00, 2.21.06).
See the forge project page for more info about the project itself.
